thread.section_title: Homeadvisor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homeadvisor | www.homeadvisor.com | 9 of 385
thread.title: Daniel A.

author: Daniel A.
title: Daniel A.
text: Needed some electrical work done on a new house we just purchased. Only received one Quote: from Thumbtack for $100-$150. Put the same project on HomeAdvisor and quickly got a response from A-Styline Electric quoting us around $80 for the same project. They were very professional and easy to work with, I would recommend them to anyone needing electrical work done. Very happy with the outcome of using HomeAdvisor for this project.
